sourcesContent: import { ViewIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons'; import { Button, IconButton, Modal, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalOverlay, useDisclosure } from '@chakra-ui/react' import React from 'react' const ProfileModal = ({user, children}) => { const {isOpen, onOpen, onClose} = useDisclosure(); return <> {children ? ({children}) : ( } onClick={onOpen}/> )} {user.name} asd ; } export default ProfileModal;
